eyBuildLib API Reference : eyBuildLib

ebmainpage

NAME

ebmainpage - csp default page

ROUTINES

ebSetMainPage( ) - set defult page for this cgi
ebGetMainPage( ) - get defult page for this cgi

DESCRIPTION

csp default page setting

ALSO SEE

request.h, respond.h

eyBuildLib : Routines

ebSetMainPage( )

NAME

ebSetMainPage( ) - set defult page for this cgi

SYNOPSIS

int ebSetMainPage
    (
    char * pagename           /* in virtual directory */
    )

DESCRIPTION

set defult page for this cgi program, the parameter pagename must the page listed in virtual directory.

RETURNS

pointer to name of this new page

SEE ALSO

ebmainpage

eyBuildLib : Routines

ebGetMainPage( )

NAME

ebGetMainPage( ) - get defult page for this cgi

SYNOPSIS

char * ebGetMainPage
    (
    char * pagename           /* in virtual directory */
    )

DESCRIPTION

get defult page user setted before

RETURNS

pointer to name of this default page

SEE ALSO

ebmainpage
